name: The black cloak of silence
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity a good amount.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'hiding'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'sneak'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'pick locks'.
